summary: Simple mod to remove exterior fog.
descriptionHtml:
I hate seeing those ugly blue mountains that dont blend in with the sky and i got tired of having to type the setfog command everytime i loaded my game.

Looks best and is meant to work with Mist enabled in newer versions of ENB. [b][u]ENB binaries .262 and .264 doesnt seem to be working properly when it comes to MIST, use .25[/u][/b]4 

Recommended:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52901/?]Skyrim High Definition LODs[/url]
Ugrids 7

Dawnguard and Dragonborn optional addons added.
All in one added.

Thanks Hishutup for helping me with the updates.
Thanks crinch33 for making the installer.



Thanks for the vid Hodilton
[youtube]j1hMBYzN1ac[/youtube]

[b]My ENB mist setting:[/b]

copy-paste at bottom/overwrite in enbseries.ini, change density or exponentialFade to your own liking.

[MIST]
IgnoreWeatherSystem=true
;EnableAnchors=true
EnableAnchors=false
;
ColorFromEnvironmentFog=0.0145
SkyLightingAmountSunrise=1.151
SkyLightingAmountDay=1.0
SkyLightingAmountSunset=1.1205
SkyLightingAmountNight=1.8
SkyLightingAmountInteriorDay=1.0
SkyLightingAmountInteriorNight=1.0
SunLightingAmountSunrise=0.1311
SunLightingAmountDay=0.125
SunLightingAmountSunset=0.12012
SunLightingAmountNight=0.1
SunLightingAmountInteriorDay=0.1
SunLightingAmountInteriorNight=0.1
DesaturationSunrise=0.4
DesaturationDay=0.4
DesaturationSunset=0.4
DesaturationNight=0.0
DesaturationInteriorDay=0.0
DesaturationInteriorNight=0.0
ColorFilterSunrise=1, 1, 1
ColorFilterDay=1, 1, 1
ColorFilterSunset=1, 1, 1
ColorFilterNight=1, 1, 1
ColorFilterInteriorDay=1, 1, 1
ColorFilterInteriorNight=1, 1, 1
;
RelativeToCameraSunrise=0.0
RelativeToCameraDay=0.0
RelativeToCameraSunset=0.0
RelativeToCameraNight=0.0
RelativeToCameraInteriorDay=0.0
RelativeToCameraInteriorNight=0.0
VerticalOffsetSunrise=-5.0
VerticalOffsetDay=-5.0
VerticalOffsetSunset=-5.0
VerticalOffsetNight=-5.0
VerticalOffsetInteriorDay=-10.0
VerticalOffsetInteriorNight=-10.0
;
DensitySunrise=1.695
DensityDay=1.65
DensitySunset=1.7
DensityNight=1.705
DensityInteriorDay=1.5
DensityInteriorNight=1.5
VerticalFadeSunrise=1.0
VerticalFadeDay=1.0
VerticalFadeSunset=2.0
VerticalFadeNight=2.0
VerticalFadeInteriorDay=4.0
VerticalFadeInteriorNight=4.0
DistanceFadeSunrise=0.9900001
DistanceFadeDay=1.0025
DistanceFadeSunset=0.9700001
DistanceFadeNight=1.0075
DistanceFadeInteriorDay=1.0
DistanceFadeInteriorNight=1.0
BottomTopSunrise=0.0125
BottomTopDay=0.01
BottomTopSunset=0.012705
BottomTopNight=0.0
BottomTopInteriorDay=0.0
BottomTopInteriorNight=0.0
ExponentialFadeSunrise=1.05
ExponentialFadeDay=1.05
ExponentialFadeSunset=1.05
ExponentialFadeNight=1.05
ExponentialFadeInteriorDay=1.0
ExponentialFadeInteriorNight=1.0


[Change Log]
1.3 - Opacity 0% (same clear effect as initial release but with no black landscape), im not happy with 15% anymore. 1.3 is probably the final version.
1.2 - same as 1.1 but with increased fog distance in immediate area (fog line was showing)
1.1 - switched to lowering fog opacity (15%) instead of increasing distance (fixed problems with black landscape)
author: gazawisay
